network.root: 0x... (optional - set to null or omit if not deploying a new root)

network.chainId: The chain ID of the network (e.g. 84532 for Base Sepolia). Avaibale in many places like https://chainlist.org/
network.environment: The environment type - can be 'testnet' or 'mainnet'
network.centrifugeId: Unique identifier for this network in the Centrifuge ecosystem. Sequence 1,2,3,4 etc.
network.root: Address of existing root contract. Set to null or omit to deploy a new root. If provided, must be a valid contract address.
network.batchGasLimit: Maximum gas limit for batched messages in gas units. Default: 25,000,000 gas.
network.etherscanUrl: The Etherscan API URL for contract verification. Examples: https://api.etherscan.io/api (mainnet), https://api-sepolia.etherscan.io/api (sepolia), https://api.basescan.org/api (base)
network.connectsTo: Only used by Wireadapters.s.sol - List of networks this network can connect to. Use the same name as the env/$chainName.json files

adapters.axelar: Get values from https://docs.axelar.dev/resources/contract-addresses/mainnet/ or /testnet - axelarId is the Chain Name field
adapters.Note1: Every adapter in this list will be deployed by Adapters.s.sol. Remove it if you do not want one of them to be deployed in this network.
adapters.Note2: Additional logic needs to be added on Adapters.s.sol for each adapter.

metadata.contracts: Deployed contract addresses. Leave empty, it'll be populated by the deployment script.
